description:
Go from project brief to mock-up.

It’s impossible to deny the influence of great design on the web. It lets us
build clear, focused products. And if becoming a designer interests you, this
course is for you. You’ll learn that design is a methodical approach to
problem solving and how to apply it to real-world problems.

You'll gain experience from day one. Starting with creating user stories to
understand customers and exploring concepts like color theory, typography, and
visual hierarchy. As with all Thinkful courses, you’ll practice new concepts
and hard skills (like Photoshop) by digging into projects that build your
portfolio. At each step you'll have an experienced designer by your side to
help you tackle difficult design decisions.
title: Modern Web Design
